name: Rogue Restaurant
description:
The recession really hit the dungeon-crawling economy hard, and Smiley Face, our intrepid heroine from Rogue, had difficulty finding work after exploring the Dungeons of Doom. Fortunately, Smiley found a job as a server at a restaurant, but this career change has quite the learning curve. And to make things worse, Smiley now has to wait on the very monsters she used to beat up in the dungeons—and boy, are they thirsty!

Help Smiley become a full-time employee by topping off the patrons' water glasses. Never let the glasses get empty, or else the customers/monsters will get annoyed and complain to your manager.

Developed by ZK and Nuyhij.

Music from Free Music. Grunt sounds from Britical Hit.
